DOC.brief_summary: This study aim search whether whole body subcutaneous adipose tissue increase PCOS patient whether tissue relate HOMA-IR plasma adiponectin level .
DOC.brief_title: Subcutaneous Adipose Tissue Cases With Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Fifty-two patient PCOS fifty-tree healthy control match body mass index ( BMI ) age ( p=0.430 , p=0.112 , respectively ) enrol study . Biceps , triceps , subscapular suprailiac skinfold thickness ( SFT ) case measure via caliper device ; mid-upper arm circumference ( MUAC ) via tape ; body fat distribution via bioelectrical impedance device . Insulin resistance calculate via HOMA-IR ELISA use measure plasma adiponectin .
DOC.criteria: All woman PCOS normal thyroidstimulating hormone prolactin ( PRL ) level . Subjects possible ovarian tumor , congenital adrenal hyperplasia , BMI great 35 kg/m2 , chronic renal liver disease , exclude study .
